only bad thing about apt-get is that its kind of bad with conflicts and problem messages.. if there is a conflict, half of what I selected is installed, the other half is not.. and the other half I selected is no longer selected either, and if that were like 20 packages, good luck with finding out which ones I selected again.. and "There is a conflict" is also not too clear, what conflict? with what package? why?
NOT that I am complaining :)
